column5: Picked up a Yukon Gear New Country Parka today at CT. Looks to be a nice piece and it's warm as well as comfortable. Perfect for those shoulder seasons North of 60*. It's a great deal at $100 off as well. Insulated, waterproof and breathable. http://www.canadiantire.ca/en/pdp/yukon-gear-tech-new-country-hunting-parka-1754308p.html#srp
Have to go look tomorrow, looks good.
Picked of one these up for my self going to wrap it and open it on Christmas morning
